Title: The Legend of Zelda: The Sage of Darkness
Writer: Dan Hogan (screenplay), Shigeru Miyamoto (based on the video game by)
Actors: Dan Hogan, Natalie Feldbusch, Connor Osborn, Blake Henderson
Plot: A classic tale of Princess Zelda, the Hero of Time, and Ganon, the Dark Lord, is retold once again as never before. Darkness has fallen over Hyrule as a young descendant of Ganon has seized...
